name: Hipponaut
description:
Hipponaut is a game where a guy is trying to stop bad info from reaching his planet. He must retribute the evil satellite waves, and protect his people from hearing bad news.

You can use a controller, or the keyboard. Arrows/Analog to move. Button/CTRL to shoot. Hold shoot to change the color in order to match the incoming waves.

The game was developed during Global Game Jam 2017
